name: Tiny Jumpy Santa - Tappy Fun
description:
Hey!

Have fun with Christmas inspired jumpy game. Play with Cute Jolly Santa Claus!

Do you want to know how it feels like to Jump High with Santa Claus in this free best addictive endless runner game? Kids are waiting for their gifts on this Christmas, but what it looks like is Santa Clause has accidentally dropped the gifts on North Pole. You have to help adorable Junior Santa to collect gifts.

Have you ever enjoyed snow games with a Cute Jolly Santa that is Fun and entertaining?

Do you have it all to master the game and keep the Santa on his track as long as possible. It is one of the best running games you will try this winter and Christmas.

Santa Claus needs to finish his original mission. The gifts need to be collected and the obstacles need to be avoided so Santa Claus can take the gifts to the children’s homes. Help him and avoid every little obstacle he may face along the way.

If you love the Christmas spirit, then this Santa Claus Jumpy game is a gift for you and it will be your favorite Christmas game to play. The artwork, graphics and sound effects are all themed for Christmas. You will adore every second playing one of the most amazing Christmas games.

FEATURES:

Tiny Jumpy Santa is a fun addictive game.
A single tap to jump high and collect gift.
Infinite fun with no limits, keep jumping, keep collecting, keep enjoying snow games.
The best santa games for kids.
A joyful and festive atmosphere.
Enjoy Bonus Stage when you complete the gift bar.

No violence - the game is perfect for children, but grown-ups will enjoy the challenge too. or even more!

Lets see How far can you go with this tiny happy santa in this Best Game of 2017!

Best of Luck!
